works.description:
The primary article is an article on the 

crisis in the South East China Sea and global geo-political and legal  
perspectives. It is co-authored by Alex Mezyaev, Jim Fetzer, Christopher  

Black, I am the principle author.

See link above. Subsequent to the TSR editors "editing" which comes  
dangerously close to mis-representing the article and plagiarism, I asked 

all articles to be removed.
